item.title: Optimal-state Dynamics Estimation for Physics-based Human Motion Capture from Videos
item.description: OSDCap: Online optimal-state dynamics estimation selectively incorporates physics models with kinematic observations to achieve highly accurate, physically-plausible human motion capture from videos.
